data.name: Underworld Dreams: The False King
data.detailed_description:
Underworld Dreams: The False King is the first game in the Underworld Dreams Anthology - the upcoming first-person horror series based firmly in the Lovecraftian mythos. Based on the works of HP Lovecraft (and Robert W Chambersâ€™ The King in Yellow) and set in the 1980s, Underworld Dreams: The False King tells the story of a man who has tracked down his missing brother to a seemingly abandoned building that hides something much more sinister behind its decrepit walls.

GAME FEATURES:

  • PSYCHOLOGICALLY INTENSE: Based on the works of renowned horror legends HP Lovecraft and Robert W. Chambers, Underworld Dreams: The False King aims to mystify and horrify players with a tale thatâ€™s both heartwrenching and mind-bending.
  • RETRO HORROR: With an atmosphere akin to classic horror titles, ammo is limited, and save spots are rare. Be cautious or be disappointed.
  • ENVIRONMENTAL STORYTELLING: The False King expertly crafts its narrative through the environment, its puzzles, and the mysteries the player encounters.
  • COMBAT THAT COUNTS: Every bullet counts in The False King and health doesnâ€™t magically recharge. You must learn when itâ€™s wise to attack, and when itâ€™s wise to run.

Wishlist the Second Game in the Underworld Dreams Anthology

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1457160/Underworld_Dreams/

data.short_description: Underworld Dreams: The False King is the first game in the Underworld Dreams Anthology - the first-person horror series based in the Lovecraftian mythos. Inspired by the works of Lovecraft and Robert W Chambers and set in the 1980s, it sets the stage for the Underworld Dreams experience.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForceÂ® GTX 650 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong horror themes, gore (such as corpses), depictions of violence, that may not be suitable for all ages.
